title: How did Amerigo Vespucci's expedition change the lives of Native Americans? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: He mapped and landed somewhere on on both continents. In essence that verified Columbus’s discoveries, and ultimately would lead to Spanish and Portuguese intrusion into the New World, followed by the English and Dutch who were faced with either acquiring comparable sources of wealth themselves or being dominated by Spanish and Portuguese interests.
Not very much. All Vespucci did was discover that South America extended much further south than previously thought. He proved the the New World was not part of Asia.
